channel.description: Go through quick setup here: https://pages.github.com/ Hugo Setup: https://gohugo.io/hosting-and-deployment/hosting-on-github/ Hereâ€™s how to set up a free website using Github pages and Hugo. You can add a custom domain name using Cloudflare for about $10 per year. The general steps include: Create a Github repository for your site. Change your pages settings. Build the repo into a Hugo site. Add DNS records for a custom domain.
